file.name: specification.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Find Types API
  license:
    name: MIT
    url: 'https://github.com/KubaJastrz/find-types/blob/master/LICENSE'
servers:
  - url: 'https://find-types.now.sh/api'
    description: Production server
  - url: 'https://localhost:3000/api'
    description: Local development server
paths:
  /package:
    get:
      summary: Add a new pet to the store
      description: ''
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: name
          description: npm package name
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/PackageData'
        400:
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
              examples: {}
        404:
          description: Package not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        500:
          description: Fetching package data failed
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
components:
  schemas:
    Package:
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - version
        - description
        - readme
        - links
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          example: react
        version:
          type: string
          example: 16.12.0
        description:
          type: string
          description: Taken from package.json
          example: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
        links:
          type: object
          description: Package links
          required:
            - npm
          properties:
            homepage:
              type: string
              example: https://reactjs.org/
            npm:
              type: string
              example: https://www.npmjs.com/package/react
            repository:
              type: string
              example: https://github.com/facebook/react
        types:
          type: string
          description:
            Relative path to declaration files parsed from "types" or "typings" fields in
            package.json
          example: index.d.ts
        deprecated:
          type: boolean
          example: true
    Error:
      type: object
      properties:
        statusCode:
          type: number
          example: 404
        message:
          type: string
          example: Package "react" not found
  responses:
    PackageData:
      description: |
        Package metadata parsed from npm registry api and package.json.
          * `package` - results for package with given `name`
          * `typesPackage` - results for DefinitelyTyped package
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            type: object
            properties:
              package:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Package'
              typesPackage:
                oneOf:
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Package'
                  - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
